about_the_game:
Total Humiliation takes the stakes to an all-new low for them and an all-new high for you.

This DLC introduces Trudy, a sweet and reserved girl who's been pulled into your debtor's desperate situation, along with her utterly powerless and pathetic boyfriend.

With this DLC, you'll experience:

  • ﻿﻿A fully fleshed-out story of Trudy's corruption, as she transitions from shy and reserved to someone entirely under your control.

  • ﻿﻿Three explicit, immersive sex scenes that showcase her gradual transformation and the complete breakdown of her boyfriend's pride.

  • ﻿﻿An even deeper dive into the thrilling, degrading dynamics of power, submission and desire that make this game a must-play for fans of netorare and humiliating erotic experiences.

Total Humiliation delivers a story and experience that will stay with you long after the final hand is dealt.

“Dominate the table, claim the girl, and leave your debtor in the dust.”

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: This is additional content for a game that contains such topics as netorare, cuckolding, humiliation, nudity and crude language.
